sn5.10:4.2: Atha kho vajirā bhikkhunī pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn5.10:4.3: Sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena andhavanaṃ tenupasaṅkami divāvihārāya.
sn5.10:4.4: Andhavanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi.
sn5.10:4.5: Atha kho māro pāpimā vajirāya bhikkhuniyā bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo samādhimhā cāvetukāmo yena vajirā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami;
sn5.10:6.2: “ko nu khvāyaṃ manusso vā amanusso vā gāthaṃ bhāsatī”ti?
sn5.10:6.4: “māro kho ayaṃ pāpimā mama bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo samādhimhā cāvetukāmo gāthaṃ bhāsatī”ti.
sn5.10:6.5: Atha kho vajirā bhikkhunī “māro ayaṃ pāpimā” iti viditvā, māraṃ pāpimantaṃ gāthāhi paccabhāsi:
sn5.10:7.1: * “Kiṃ nu sattoti paccesi,
sn5.10:8.1: * Yathā hi aṅgasambhārā,
sn5.10:8.4: hoti sattoti sammuti.
sn5.10:10.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā “jānāti maṃ vajirā bhikkhunī”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
